page.title: 15TRADE IN CRUDEN BAY.
page.content: There are 6 shops in Cruden Bay, all privately owned. Thr Chip Shop( take-away ) is situated near the Council Estate and gets trade from all over the village. The Chemist's shop is situated in the centre of the village and sells tobacco, confectionery, stationery, and newspapers as well as medicines and toiletries. The Butcher's is a family business. They sell bakery fruit and dairy products as well as meat. An Ironmongery shop is run in conjunction with the Post Office. Ashton's is the main Grocer's shop, and has a good selection of food products. Smillies sells newspapers, stationery, fruit and vegetables. Ashton's and Smillies are both licenced to sell liquor.
